thread.title: Fans poke fun at Drake's 'Hotline Bling' dancing
thread.title_full: Fans poke fun at Drake's 'Hotline Bling' dancing

title: Fans poke fun at Drake's 'Hotline Bling' dancing
text:
Fans poke fun at Drake's 'Hotline Bling' dancing 
Postmedia Network Tuesday, October 20, 2015 12:48 PM CDT | Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 01:13 PM CDT YouTube Drake attacks Meek Mill in new track, 'Charged Up' 
Not many rappers would highlight their goofy dance moves in a big budget music video, but at this point in his career, Drake makes it work. 
Not long after he dropped the video for latest track, "Hotline Bling," Monday - which features the Toronto hip hop star dancing like a drunk uncle at a Christmas party - fans took to social media to poke fun at his dancing "skills." 
And so the hashtag and meme #DrakeAlwaysOnBeat was born, with fans uploading videos of Drake dancing to the beat of other songs including the theme songs for The Cosby Show and Charlie Brown. 
Have a look at the original video and then the creative fan homages: 
Drake dancing to Cosby Show theme song: — drake dancing to (@DRAKEDANClNG) October 20, 2015 
Drake dancing to Charlie Brown theme song: — drake dancing to (@DRAKEDANClNG) October 20, 2015 
Drake dancing to 2 Milly: — drake dancing to (@DRAKEDANClNG) October 20, 2015 
And to top off the awkwardness, he wore a turtleneck in some of the shots. Perfection.
